attributes.review: I can’t believe that this app didn’t leave a trigger warning! When I opened it my 3 year old was next to me, and the first thing we saw was this scary, orange blob! She started crying like crazy and she’s been getting nightmares ever since! This app MUST be taken down. . .otherwise children everywhere  are will have to deal with the traumatic experience experience of seeing that orange monster!
attributes.title: my poor kid!

attributes.review: This app is absolutely riddled with racist republicans and filled with hate and people bringing other people down. This app has ruined peoples self esteem and been awful and rude to everybody. So what if I have an opinion its what I think.I just wanted to see what our wonderful cheeto, orange of president was going to do for the election. This app has done absolutely nothing for anyone. I hope this app is taken down!!!🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: Awful app

attributes.review: Soooo, i downloaded this app just to open it and SEE AN OOMPA LOOMPA. i went to show my mom and she hit me to M A R S. i saw a blobfish and a salmon so i showed the OOMPA LOOMPA to the ~ b l o b f i s h ~ and he whacked me to my backyard where i saw a 🌲t r è🌲. i climbed it just to see a HAWK and a squirrel:))):)):):)):):):) i showed it to the hawk and she cacawed me out of the🌲trè 🌲i walked back in the house and showed it to my mom, and she screamed at me, hit me, and disowned me :(( SO. by downloading this app, i have lost my brain. k - b o i b y e -

attributes.review: I download the app to see what Donald trump wants to do but it took me a week for it to download and when I open the app I saw the scariest thing the Orange himself. I’ve had to go therapy to weeks to get over the nightmares of seeing his face on this horrible app. I’ve been trying to delete for weeks and it won’t let me delete it and it also spams with notifications all day. THIS IS THE WORST APP EVER.
attributes.title: Worst app ever created

attributes.review: I was all excited to support the orange man, but once I downloaded this app I started hearing voices around my home. Now you may think these are not connected. But as soon as I got the app, it started. I heard voices whispering “people are being held in cages at the border” and “there is still no justice for breonna Taylor” whenever I opened the app. I fear that this app is possessed and I would tell everyone to please not download this.
attributes.title: Oh no

attributes.review: I am not part of the gen z trying to ruin the app but it was so slow and took forever to download and after it downloaded it crashed the app a few times befor freazzinf my whole phone and casusing me the have to restart my phone and delete the app I think the app needs to be deleted and fixed befor being put back on the site
attributes.title: This is the worst app

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and within a few hours my phone started glitching and spammed my messages and social media’s with photos of Tru*p as Rambo. Please remove. I believe this app is a scam and unnecessary. I got non stop ads for guns and ads of Tru*p popped up while I was screen sharing during a zoom call working with kids and I don’t believe showing a rap¡$t/ rac¡$t to these children was acceptable.
attributes.title: Rate 1 star.

attributes.review: This app caused my phone to glitch and not work. Turns my phone off randomly. Allows people to find my number and text me malicious links. And spam me with their only fans. This is a fraudulent application. Texting trump is like tike texting a beehive with no real goal but to get stung. Please remove this app, before anyone else breaks their phone due to it.
attributes.title: One of the most unsuccessful working apps

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it was nothing that it said it was I thought I was signing up to get free Cheetos but it’s the presidential app??? And it made my phone crash like 10 different times, I had no choice but to delete it. The false advertising and the bugs just made it so this app doesn’t work what so ever. It’s frustrating and it made my phone slower than its ever been.
attributes.title: Cheeto puff
